Kashira:
Koyaku (子役)

Category: Child

– Click image to view.

Plays:

The Battle of Sakamoto Castle (Ōmi Genji senjin yakata / 近江源氏先陣館)

The Twenty-Four Dutiful Sons (Honchō nijūshikō / 本朝廿四孝)

The Battles of Genji and Heike (Hiragana seisuiki / ひらかな盛衰記)

A Tragic Love Triangle (Hadesugata onna maiginu / 艶容女舞衣)

Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees (Yoshitsune senbonzakura / 義経千本桜)

The Inauspicious Sword (Sakuratsuba urami no samezaya / 桜鍔恨鮫鞘)

The White Fox of Shinoda (Ashiya Dōman ōuchi kagami / 芦屋道満大内鑑)

The Nunobiki Waterfall (Genpei Nunobiki no taki / 源平布引滝)

The Vendetta by a Samurai in Rags (Katakiuchi tsuzure no nishiki / 敵討襤褸錦敵討襤褸錦)

The Old Tale of Kusunoki (Kusunoki mukashibanashi / 楠昔噺)

The Gion Festival (Gion sairei shinkōki / 祇園祭礼信仰記)

The Shiraishi Story (Go taiheiki shiraishi banashi / 碁太平記白石噺)

Gonza the Lancer (Yari no Gonza kasane katabira / 鑓の権三重帷子)

The Loyal Samurai (Taiheiki chūshin kōshaku / 太平記忠臣講釈)

The Two-Colored Reins (Koinyōbō somewake tazuna / 恋女房染分手綱)

The Courier for Hell (Meido no hikyaku / 冥途の飛脚)

The Adachi Plain in Oshu (Ōshu Adachigahara / 奥州安達原)

The Ridge Pole of the Sanjusangendo Temple (Sanjūsangendō munagi no yurai / 三十三間堂棟由来)

The Battle of Kawanakajima (Shinshū Kawanakajima kassen / 信州川中島合戦)

The Bloodshed at Ise (Ise ondo koi no netaba / 伊勢音頭恋寝刃)

The Shank's Mare along the Tokaido Highway (Tōkai dōchu hizakurige / 東海道中膝栗毛)

The Courtesan Yugiri (Yūgiri Awa no Naruto / 夕霧阿波鳴渡)

The Stone Monument of Glory (Hana no ueno homare no ishibumi / 花上野誉碑)

Oshun and Dembei (Chikagoro kawara no tatehiki / 近頃河原の達引)

The Romance in the Gay Quarters (Kuruwa bunshō / 曲輪ぶんしょう)

The Trouble in the Date Household (Meiboku sendaihagi / 伽羅先代萩)

The Battle of Ichinotani (Ichinotani futaba gunki / 一谷嫩軍記)

Akogi Bay in Ise Province (Seishū Akogigaura / 勢州阿漕浦)

The Woman-Killer and the Hell of Oil (Onnakoroshi abura no jigoku / 女殺油地獄)

The Vow of Rokusuke (Hikosan gongen chikai no sukedachi / 彦山権現誓助剣)

Kagekiyo and His Daughter (Musume Kagekiyo Yashima nikki / 嬢景清八嶋日記)

Tragedy on a Snowy Night (Akegarasu yuki no akebono / 明烏六花曙)

The Color Prints of Kagamiyama (Kagamiyama kokyō no nishikie / 加賀見山旧錦絵)

The League of the 47 Ronin (Kanadehon Chūshingura / 仮名手本忠臣蔵)
